name: Cable Plug
description:
My idea was to create a game in which we had to solve puzzles at the portal, by plugging different cables into different receptacles to open a door and thus complete the level, there would have been constraints such as an electric appliance that would have blocked the current where a mini-game would have to be solved to allow the current to pass. Or a generator, which should be managed so that it doesn’t go out.

But my project was far too ambitious for the short time remaining and especially for my knowledge in the Unreal Engine 4 engine.

I still upload my project, you can only take the cable and move with it.
